title: Crypto
description: “Five bucks says it’s a bear…” When your job involves everything from investigating alien sightings to catching escaped emus, sometimes on the same call, you get pretty used to the extraordinary becoming ordinary. It was just another Monday at the Chimera Foundation for two field biologists when they would make the discovery of a lifetime. Up close and personal with the most legendary cryptid of all time, the scientists quickly realize that what their subject can teach them has little to do with blood and bones and everything to do with head and heart.
author: B.C. Nyren
